name: Hearts of Hallow's Eve
description:
It's Halloween night when you get left alone at the the spookiest party in town. Everyone's costume looks convincing, but maybe a little too scary and realistic. But that won't stop you from meeting monsters and making friends in Hearts of Hallow's Eve.
